TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class OdbcDataAdapter : System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter, ICloneable

.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OdbcDataAdapter extends System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter implements class System.Data.IDataAdapter, class System.Data.IDbDataAdapter, class System.ICloneable
Public NotInheritable Class OdbcDataAdapter Inherits DbDataAdapter Implements ICloneable
public ref class OdbcDataAdapter sealed : System::Data::Common::DbDataAdapter, ICloneable

summary.span: 表示資料命令集和資料來源連接，這些是用來填入 並更新資料來源。

span.span: Represents a set of data commands and a connection to a data source that are used to fill the and update the data source.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當做之間的橋樑`DataSet`以及擷取和儲存資料的資料來源。The serves as a bridge between a `DataSet` and data source for retrieving and saving data. 透過提供這個橋接器將資料載入到資料來源，並使用傳送中所做的變更回資料來源。The provides this bridge by using to load data from the data source into the , and using to send changes made in the back to the data source. 當填滿，它會建立必要的資料表和資料行傳回的資料如果它們尚不存在。When the fills a , it creates the required tables and columns for the returned data if they do not already exist. 不過，主索引鍵資訊不包含隱含建立的結構描述中除非屬性設定為。However, primary key information is not included in the implicitly created schema unless the property is set to . 您也可能建立的結構描述，包括主索引鍵資訊的詳細資訊，再填入資料使用。You may also have the create the schema of the , including primary key information, before filling it with data using . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[將現有條件約束加入至資料集](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/adding-existing-constraints-to-a-dataset.md)。For more information, see [Adding Existing Constraints to a DataSet](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/adding-existing-constraints-to-a-dataset.md). > [!NOTE] > 當您呼叫`Fill`上並沒有主索引鍵資料行的資料來源方法嘗試升級的主索引鍵的唯一條件約束資料行。When you call the `Fill` method on a data source that does not have a primary key column, the tries to promote the unique constraint column to the primary key. 在過程中，標示為不可為 null 的唯一條件約束。In the process, the marks the unique constraint as not nullable. 除非 unique 條件約束資料行中 null 值，適用於這種行為。This behavior works unless there is a null value in the unique constraint column. 若有 null 值，`Fill`方法因條件約束違規。If there is a null value, the `Fill` method fails with a constraint violation. 若要避免這種情況下，不允許 null 值的唯一條件約束資料行中。To avoid this situation, do not allow null values in the unique constraint column. > [!NOTE] > 由於原生 ODBC 驅動程式，只能有一個限制永遠會傳回當您呼叫。Due to the limitations of native ODBC drivers, only one is ever returned when you call . 這是，則為 true，即使在執行 SQL 批次陳述式的多個預期物件。This is true even when executing SQL batch statements from which multiple objects would be expected. 也包含， ， ， ，和`TableMappings`屬性，以加速載入和更新的資料。The also includes the , , , , and `TableMappings` properties to facilitate loading and updating of data. ## Examples 下列範例會使用， ，和選取的記錄，並填入`DataSet`與選取的資料列。The following example uses , , and to select records and populate a `DataSet` with the selected rows. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您建立的執行個體，下列的唯寫和唯讀屬性設定為其預設值，如下表所示。When you create an instance of , the following write-only and read-only properties are set to their default values, as shown in the table. |屬性Properties|預設值Default value| |----------------|-------------------| ||`MissingMappingAction.Passthrough`| ||`MissingSchemaAction.Add`| 您可以變更任何這些屬性，透過呼叫另一個屬性的值。You can change the value of any of these properties through a separate call to the property. ## Examples 下列範例會建立並設定其屬性的某些。The following example creates an and sets some of its properties. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter.OdbcDataAdapter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter.OdbcDataAdapter/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter.OdbcDataAdapter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter.OdbcDataAdapter/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項實作很有用的應用程式，必須呼叫`Fill`方法的兩個或多個物件。This implementation of the can be useful in an application that must call the `Fill` method for two or more objects. ## Examples 下列範例會建立並設定其屬性的某些。The following example creates an and sets some of its properties. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個多載建構函式使用`selectConnectionString`參數來設定屬性。This overload of the constructor uses the `selectConnectionString` parameter to set the property. 不過，它不會開啟連接。However, it does not open the connection. 您仍然必須明確開啟連接。You still must explicitly open the connection. ## Examples 下列範例會建立並設定其屬性的某些。The following example creates an and sets some of its properties. summary.span: 取得或設定用來在資料來源中刪除資料錄的 SQL 陳述式或預存程序。

span.span: Gets or sets an SQL statement or stored procedure used to delete records in the data source.

value.span: ，用來在更新作業期間刪除資料來源中的資料錄，這些資料錄對應至 中刪除的資料列。

span.span: An used during an update operation to delete records in the data source that correspond to deleted rows in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性會被指派到先前建立、不會被複製。When the property is assigned to a previously created , the is not cloned. 相反地，維護參考先前建立的。Instead, the maintains a reference to the previously created . 更新作業期間，如果未設定，且主索引鍵資訊是存在於，您可以使用類別來自動產生，與協調所需的其他命令到資料來源。During an update operation, if is not set and primary key information is present in the , you can use the class to automatically generate the , and additional commands needed to reconcile the to the data source. 若要這樣做，請設定屬性。To do this, set the property of the . 產生邏輯也需要索引鍵資料行資訊存在於。The generation logic also requires key column information to be present in the . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Commandbuilder 產生命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md). ## Examples 下列範例會建立並設定和屬性。The following example creates an and sets the and properties. 它假設您已經建立物件。It assumes that you have already created an object. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter.DeleteCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter.DeleteCommand/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter.DeleteCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter.DeleteCommand/VB/source.vb#1)]

value.span: 更新作業期間使用的 ，可將資料來源中對應新資料列的記錄插入 。

span.span: An used during an update operation to insert records in the data source that correspond to new rows in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性會被指派到先前建立物件不會被複製。When the property is assigned to a previously created object, the is not cloned. 相反地，維護參考先前建立的。Instead, maintains a reference to the previously created . 更新作業期間，如果未設定，且主索引鍵資訊是存在於，您可以使用類別來自動產生，與協調所需的其他命令資料來源。During an update operation, if is not set and primary key information is present in the , you can use the class to automatically generate , and additional commands needed to reconcile the to the data source. 若要這樣做，請設定屬性。To do this, set the property of the . 產生邏輯也需要索引鍵資料行資訊存在於。The generation logic also requires key column information to be present in the . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Commandbuilder 產生命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md). > [!NOTE] > 如果執行此命令會傳回資料列，這些資料列可能會加入至視您如何設定屬性物件。If execution of this command returns rows, these rows may be added to the depending upon how you set the property of the object. ## Examples 下列範例會建立並設定和屬性。The following example creates an and sets the and properties. 它假設您已經建立物件。It assumes that you have already created an object. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter.InsertCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter.InsertCommand/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter.InsertCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter.InsertCommand/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 發生於已經針對資料來源執行命令後的更新作業期間。

span.span: Occurs during an update operation after a command is executed against the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您使用，有兩個每個更新的資料列就會發生的事件。When you use , there are two events that occur per data row updated. 執行的順序如下所示：The order of execution is as follows: 1. 中的值移到參數值。The values in the are moved to the parameter values. 2. 便會引發 事件。The event is raised. 3. 執行命令。The command executes. 4. 如果命令設定為`FirstReturnedRecord`，第一個傳回的結果放在。If the command is set to `FirstReturnedRecord`, the first returned result is placed in the . 5. 如果沒有輸出參數，它們會放置於。If there are output parameters, they are placed in the . 6. 便會引發 事件。The event is raised. 7. 呼叫 。 is called.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event RowUpdating As OdbcRowUpdatingEventHandler

summary.span: 發生在已經針對資料來源執行命令前的 期間。

span.span: Occurs during before a command is executed against the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您使用，有兩個每個更新的資料列就會發生的事件。When you use , there are two events that occur per data row updated. 執行的順序如下所示：The order of execution is as follows: 1. 中的值移到參數值。The values in the are moved to the parameter values. 2. 便會引發 事件。The event is raised. 3. 執行命令。The command executes. 4. 如果命令設定為`FirstReturnedRecord`，第一個傳回的結果放在。If the command is set to `FirstReturnedRecord`, the first returned result is placed in the . 5. 如果沒有輸出參數，它們會放置於。If there are output parameters, they are placed in the . 6. 便會引發 事件。The event is raised. 7. 呼叫 。 is called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當指派到先前建立、不會被複製。When is assigned to a previously created , the is not cloned. 相反地，維護參考先前建立的物件。Instead, the maintains a reference to the previously created object. 如果傳回任何資料列，資料表不會加入至，並會引發任何例外狀況。If returns no rows, no tables are added to the , and no exception is raised. ## Examples 下列範例會建立並設定和屬性。The following example creates an and sets the and properties. 它假設您已經建立物件。It assumes that you have already created an object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Data::Odbc::OdbcCommand ^ UpdateCommand { System::Data::Odbc::OdbcCommand ^ get(); void set(System::Data::Odbc::OdbcCommand ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定用來在資料來源中更新記錄的 SQL 陳述式或預存程序。

span.span: Gets or sets an SQL statement or stored procedure used to update records in the data source.

value.span: 更新作業期間使用的 ，可將與 中修改過的資料列對應的資料來源記錄更新。

span.span: An used during an update operation to update records in the data source that correspond to modified rows in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當指派到先前建立、不會被複製。When is assigned to a previously created , the is not cloned. 相反地，維護參考先前建立的物件。Instead, the maintains a reference to the previously created object. 更新作業期間，如果未設定，且主索引鍵資訊是存在於，您可以使用類別來自動產生，與協調所需的其他命令資料來源。During an update operation, if is not set and primary key information is present in the , you can use the class to automatically generate , and additional commands needed to reconcile the to the data source. 若要這樣做，請設定屬性。To do this, set the property of the . 產生邏輯也需要索引鍵資料行資訊存在於。The generation logic also requires key column information to be present in the . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Commandbuilder 產生命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md). > [!NOTE] > 如果執行此命令會傳回資料列，這些資料列可能會合併與視您如何設定屬性物件。If execution of this command returns rows, these rows may be merged with the depending upon how you set the property of the object. ## Examples 下列範例會建立並設定和屬性。The following example creates an and sets the and properties. 它假設您已經建立物件。It assumes that you have already created an object. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter.UpdateCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter.UpdateCommand/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter.UpdateCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcDataAdapter.UpdateCommand/VB/source.vb#1)]
